products.title: Bella Blackout Beige Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout beige roller blind. Made to measure from 9.60 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. Bella blackout beige is a stunning beige shade, it will compliment wooden tones throughout the home.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2213 fabric colour: beige material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes
